attributes.additional_details:
I am very concerned that if this clause  is not removed,  it would give the Home Secretary the ability to deprive UK nationals of their citizenship without notice. 
Clause 9 of this bill is draconian racist and has huge implications for uk nationals. It is divisive and will create a ‘ them & us’, schism and can be used as a tool  broadly to make UK citizens stateless by removing their British citizenship. 
Clause 9 Must be removed
attributes.background: REMOVE CLAUSE 9 FROM THE NATIONALITY & BORDERS BILL

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601583
